00045         bool m_bTerminate;
00046         QString m_szFileName;
00047 public:
00048         void terminate();
00049 protected:
00050         virtual void play();
00051         virtual void run();
00052 };

00109 typedef bool (KviSoundPlayer::*SoundSystemPlayRoutine)(const QString &szFileName);
00110 typedef void (KviSoundPlayer::*SoundSystemCleanupRoutine)();
00111 
00112 class KviSoundPlayerEntry
00113 {
00114 private:
00115         SoundSystemPlayRoutine m_pPlayRoutine;
00116         SoundSystemCleanupRoutine m_pCleanupRoutine;
00117 public:
00118         KviSoundPlayerEntry(SoundSystemPlayRoutine pPlayRoutine,SoundSystemCleanupRoutine pCleanupRoutine)
00119                 : m_pPlayRoutine(pPlayRoutine), m_pCleanupRoutine(pCleanupRoutine)
00120         {
00121         }
00122 
00123         SoundSystemPlayRoutine playRoutine() const
00124         {
00125                 return m_pPlayRoutine;
00126         }
00127         
00128         SoundSystemCleanupRoutine cleanupRoutine() const
00129         {
00130                 return m_pCleanupRoutine;
00131         }
00132         
00133 };

00135 class KviSoundPlayer : public QObject
00136 {
00137         friend class KviSoundThread;
00138         Q_OBJECT
00139 public:
00140         KviSoundPlayer();
00141         virtual ~KviSoundPlayer();
00142 public:
00143         bool play(const QString &szFileName);
00144         void detectSoundSystem();
00145         bool havePlayingSounds();
00146         void getAvailableSoundSystems(QStringList * l);
00147         bool isMuted()
00148         {
00149                 return KVI_OPTION_BOOL(KviOption_boolMuteAllSounds);
00150         }
00151         void setMuted(bool muted)
00152         {
00153                 KVI_OPTION_BOOL(KviOption_boolMuteAllSounds) = muted;
00154         }
00155 protected:
00156         KviPointerList<KviSoundThread> * m_pThreadList;
00157         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviSoundPlayerEntry> * m_pSoundSystemDict;
00158 #ifdef COMPILE_PHONON_SUPPORT
00159         Phonon::MediaObject * m_pPhononPlayer;
00160 #endif //!COMPILE_PHONON_SUPPORT
00161         KviSoundPlayerEntry * m_pLastUsedSoundPlayerEntry;
00162 protected:
00163         void registerSoundThread(KviSoundThread * t);
00164         void unregisterSoundThread(KviSoundThread * t);
00165         virtual bool event(QEvent *e);
00166 protected:
00167         void stopAllSoundThreads();
00168         void cleanupAfterLastPlayerEntry();
00169 #ifdef COMPILE_PHONON_SUPPORT
00170         bool playPhonon(const QString &szFileName);
00171         void cleanupPhonon();
00172 #endif //!COMPILE_PHONON_SUPPORT
00173 #if defined(COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS) || defined(COMPILE_ON_MINGW)
00174         bool playWinmm(const QString &szFileName);
00175         void cleanupWinmm();
00176 #else //!COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS
00177         #ifdef COMPILE_OSS_SUPPORT
00178                 bool playOss(const QString &szFileName);
00179                 void cleanupOss();
00180                 #ifdef COMPILE_AUDIOFILE_SUPPORT
00181                         bool playOssAudiofile(const QString &szFileName);
00182                         void cleanupOssAudiofile();
00183                 #endif //COMPILE_AUDIOFILE_SUPPORT
00184         #endif //COMPILE_OSS_SUPPORT
00185         #ifdef COMPILE_ARTS_SUPPORT
00186                 bool playArts(const QString &szFileName);
00187                 void cleanupArts();
00188         #endif //COMPILE_ARTS_SUPPORT
00189         #ifdef COMPILE_ESD_SUPPORT
00190                 bool playEsd(const QString &szFileName);
00191                 void cleanupEsd();
00192         #endif //COMPILE_ESD_SUPPORT
00193 #endif //!COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS
00194         bool playQt(const QString &szFileName);
00195         void cleanupQt();
00196         bool playNull(const QString &szFileName);
